entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 5.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm except 20 mm near Port Alice. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm except 10 mm near Port Alice. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
